name: postListMemberTags
description: Add or remove tags from a list member. If a tag that does not exist is passed in and set as 'active', a new tag will be created.

list_id.description: The unique ID for the list.

subscriber_hash.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address.

body.description: A list of tags assigned to a list member.

is_syncing.description: When is_syncing is true, automations based on the tags in the request will not fire
is_syncing.title: Is Syncing

tags.description: A list of tags assigned to the list member.

items.description: Add or remove tags on a member by declaring a tag either active or inactive on a member.

status.description: The status for the tag on the member, pass in active to add a tag or inactive to remove it.
status.title: Status

items.title: Member Tag

tags.title: Tags

body.title: Member Tags
